name: Just Cause 3: XXL Edition
storyline: The Mediterranean republic of Medici is suffering under the brutal control of General Di Ravello, a dictator with an insatiable appetite for power. Enter Rico Rodriguez, a man on a mission to destroy the General’s hold on power by any means necessary. With over 400 square miles of complete freedom from sky to seabed and a huge arsenal of weaponry, gadgets and vehicles, prepare to unleash chaos in the most creative and explosive ways you can imagine.
summary:
The Just Cause 3 XXL Edition packs the critically acclaimed Just Cause 3 game as well as a great selection of extra missions, explosive weapons and vehicles to expand your experience in Medici.

Just Cause 3: XXL Edition includes:
- Just Cause 3
- Air, Land and Sea Expansion Pass
- Weaponized Vehicle Pack
- Explosive Weapon Pack
- Reaper Missile Mech
- Kousavá Rifle
